tool.name: feature
tool.command:
tripaille feature sync
#if $organism: --organism "$organism" #end if #if $organism_id: --organism_id "$organism_id" #end if #if $max_sync: --max_sync "$max_sync" #end if #for $rep in $repeat_types: --types "$rep.types" #end for #for $rep in $repeat_ids: --ids "$rep.ids" #end for #if $job_name: --job_name "$job_name" #end if #if $no_wait: $no_wait #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: organism
param.label: Organism
param.help: Common name of the organism to sync

param.name: organism_id
param.label: Organism Id
param.help: ID of the organism to sync

param.name: max_sync
param.label: Max Sync
param.help: Maximum number of features to sync (default: all)

param.name: types
param.label: Types
param.help: List of types of records to be synced (e.g. gene mRNA, default: all)

param.name: ids
param.label: Ids
param.help: List of names of records to be synced (e.g. gene0001, default: all)

param.name: no_wait
param.label: No Wait
param.help: Return immediately without waiting for job completion
